results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the expression of heme oxygenase-1 in human RPE cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may have some clinical benefits in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal diseases@@@ associated with oxidative stress, such as @DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim KJ, Kim KS, Kim NR, Chin HS. Effects of simvastatin on the expression of heme oxygenase-1 in human RPE cells. Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2012 Sep 21;53(10):6456-64. PMID: 22918643

results.title: Improvement of Retinal Vascular Injury in Diabetic Rats by Statins Is Associated With the Inhibition of Mitochondrial Reactive Oxygen Species Pathway Mediated by Peroxisome Proliferator-Activated Receptor gamma Coactivator 1alpha
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to clarify the beneficial effects and mechanism of action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal vascular damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Zheng Z, Chen H, Wang H, Ke B, Zheng B, Li Q, Li P, Su L, Gu Q, Xu X. Improvement of Retinal Vascular Injury in Diabetic Rats by Statins Is Associated With the Inhibition of Mitochondrial Reactive Oxygen Species Pathway Mediated by Peroxisome Proliferator-Activated Receptor gamma Coactivator 1alpha Diabetes. 2010 Sep;59(9):2315-25. PMID: 20566666
